title: So chiefs & their fanboys
body:
Where's all your trash talking about BKT from day 1 now?
Get rekt lmao.

replies.body: Yay for league of Asian's at worlds.... still think best way is to just get the best team in every region or top 2 the just do a knock out tournament with best 3 matches with best of 5 for finals. cause a full list of Asian's for a world series is kinda dull, granted that they are great at the game but still maybe more then like 3 western teams would be nice. not trying to be racist but its true
That swiper throw. 100% world class.. hahaha
